title: Golfers Throwing Their Clubs
headline: Golfers Throwing Their Clubs
description: Yes, the pros really are like us. After too many bad shots, sometimes you just have to throw a club. From Ben Crenshaw to Tiger Woods to Chris Couch, here's a look at some of the finest club tossing in professional golf.
body: Yes, the pros really are like us. After too many bad shots, sometimes you just have to throw a club. From Ben Crenshaw to Tiger Woods to Chris Couch, here's a look at some of the finest club tossing in professional golf.
